DOC.brief_summary: This is an open, multicenter phase Ⅱ clinical trial. The purpose of this study is to evaluate acute toxicity and efficacy of cetuximab (C225) combined with IMRT + neoadjuvant chemotherapy in advanced T stage of nasopharyngeal carcinoma. Besides, to figure out the relationship between patient outcome and EGFR gene copy number, expression and mutation.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Chemoradiotherapy Combined With Cetuximab in Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma
